101.comments: For inquiries, please contact the SBME Student Services at undergrad@bme.ubc.ca.

WL1.comments: Students who register in this waitlist section are not guaranteed registration in the course. Student will be accomodated into the course provided seats are available and the instructor has given permission to register (NOTE IGEN and MTRL students do not need permission from the instructor to register). Please check the SSC in early August to view registration changes. Please note BMEG students are not permitted to register for BMEG 410.

description: Principles and operation of biomedical equipment for cardiovascular system, respiratory system, renal dialysis, endoscopy, surgery, and imaging. Functional relationships of biomedical equipment to physiology and anatomy of major body systems. Credit will be granted for only one of BMEG 410 or BMEG 510.
